Pre-Game Insights: Dallas went 50-32 overall with a 25-16 record at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Mavericks shot 48.1% from the field and 36.9% from 3-point range last season.
Chicago finished 39-43 overall with a 19-22 record on the road last season.
The Bulls averaged 7.8 steals, 4.8 blocks and 11.7 turnovers per game last season.
Mavericks: Dante Exum: out (wrist), Maxi Kleber: day to day (hamstring).
Bulls: Zach LaVine: day to day (hip), Lonzo Ball: out (wrist).
